CustomField.formula: IF( AND(TEXT(Status__c) != "Entregue Cliente", TEXT(Status__c) != "Atendido", TEXT(Status__c) != "Cancelado", TEXT(Status__c) != "Faturado", !ISNULL(DATEVALUE(Order.InicioAgAprovComercial__c))) , TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Order.InicioAgAprovComercial__c),NULL)
CustomField.label: Tempo em Aberto
